name: Bombshell (itch)
description:
Bombshell is an interactive visual novel game that follows Ben, the main protagonist as he explores the new world turned upside down by recent bombings in the area. Bombshell has the player choose between staying safe or delving into danger through a series of choices that tailor how the game plays out. 

Will you explore the wreckage or will you stay safe?
